climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: SUPER SOFT AREA RUG: Lying with your eyes closed on a fluffy, low pile carpet will make you fall in love with the soft touch of the area rug and feel incredibly relaxed. Living room rugs add texture to your floors, help dampen noise and keep kids off hardwood floors

MODERN HOME DECOR RUGS: The Moroccan rugs feature layered geometric textures that give them a chic look and make them the central focal point of any room. If you're looking for minimalist rugs for living room that still has an element of style, then this is the perfect choice for you

CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Low pile bedroom rugs are not prone to dirt buildup; you simply need to broom or vacuum the surface to clean up debris, hair, or dust. Accent rugs may contain temporary creases when they arrive, allow time for the creases to flatten and secure. They will disappear more quickly if you press something heavy on the carpet

WIDELY USED RUG: Each indoor area rug is paired with a neutral palette for most home spaces. This abstract rug is ideal for the home is perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, home offices, nurseries, and a variety of other places, effortlessly adding a new look to your room

DURABLE RUBBER BACKING: The bottom of the dining room rug is covered with rubber points of such high density that there is enough grip to prevent the rug from moving across the floor. The delicate power construction ensures that the carpet for living room will barely shed, so if you're looking for a durable area rug, this one won't let you down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty rug. It’s extremely soft. Frankly, I bought it to go near my front door to replace a rag rug that I had there for 5 years. It was easy to wash and dry at home and my dog loved it. But it stated to come apart so looked for rugs on Amazon and chose this one. As I said, it is extremely soft. Has good backing so it doesn’t slide around. And, yes, the pooch of the house loves it too. I think it would be great next to a bed as you got out of bed. Rey nice. One not…I haven’t noticed any dirt stains, or any other kinds of stains, so I didn’t answer that question. If it doesn’t clean easily, I will come back to edit this. Meanwhile, I like this rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I’m genuinely surprised by its quality. Usually something like this I need to see and feel it before I buy it, but I couldn’t find anything to go with the vibe with my house so I took a chance and trusted the reviews.My first worry was that it was going to look cheap like printed.. it does not. It’s better looking than most of the target and Lowe’s rugs I looked at.My second worry was thickness, because some reviews said it was like a thick blanket rather than a rug.. it’s not. It has that rug back that you’d expect, but the top IS so soft like a blanket.My final concern was vacuuming. I have a large dog that sheds so I have to vacuum my wood floors and carpet. I have a very strong vacuum and it does not suck up the rug. Thank goodness. It is so easy to clean.Yes it oddly comes in a box, but the folding lines went away the next day.The only thing I would warn about is that it is slippery because of how soft it his. I’ve had no issue but my husband keeps wiping out somehow lolI’m very happy with it and do recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing rug for price
reviews.reviewText: This rug is AMAZING. Very soft and comfortable to walk on. Easy to roll out as it does not have the hard backing. Love it I bought two!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft, Washable
reviews.reviewText: Love this rug! I have gotten so many compliments on it. It looks great and feels great and doesn't slip and slide around, even without a rug grip underneath. I have washed it in my washing machine as well and comes out great! Only complaint is because it is so soft it is slippery, and can give a harsh rug burn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is soooo soft!! We ordered it for my daughters room and she loves it! Perfect size and great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This rug is HEAVEN!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been through many rugs with a dog and kids. I wanted something washable. I haven't washed it so I can't say how it holds us after that or if it cleans up well. BUT this rug is the softest rug ever. It is like heaven under your feet. I lay on it sometimes just because it's that soft. My kids are obsessed with it, in fact so much, they are very careful to not wear shoes or have food and drinks near it. It is very hard to vacuum but manageable. I forgot to order a anti-slip grip mat for under it and figured I would just order one after getting it if needed but turns out it doesn't slide on hard floors at all! I would give this rug 10 stars if I could!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely in love.
reviews.reviewText: I am obsessed with this rug. It is super soft and very easy to clean. My dog had an accident on it and the stains came out and even after 2 months, it still feel soft and looks brand new. It will be a while before we have to replace this piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality rug
reviews.reviewText: The rug is so soft. We love the color and feel. The entire underside is non slip grip which is really nice.
